txt.en: You should hunt down the leader of the Enemy's scouts
The mounted scouts of the Enemy surely have a captain who leads them.
The mounted scouts of the Enemy surely have a captain who leads them.\n\nYou should find him and defeat him.
Mokrûk, captain of the Enemy's mounted scouts, may be found somewhere in the northern part of the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should find and defeat Mokrûk, captain of the Enemy's mounted scouts.
'You have rendered us a service unasked for once again! The defeat of this uruk-captain will be of great help to us.\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder].'
Mokrûk, captain of the Enemy's mounted scouts, may be found somewhere in the northern part of the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should find and defeat Mokrûk, captain of the Enemy's mounted scouts.
Thane Béortnoth is encamped beyond the walls of Thornhope.\n\nYou should return to Thane Béortnoth with news of Mokrûk's defeat.
Talk to Béortnoth outside of Thornhope
